name: C.R.E.A.M. Europe PPP Alliance
goal: C.R.E.A.M. Europe PPP Alliance is a Think Tank and Learning Organization to promote and assist in PPP projects in all infrastructure areas by the EuroPPP and MasterPPPlan initiatives and Life-Cycle Project Alliancing approach. The C.R.E.A.M. network highlights and facilitates the stronger involvement of private industries in public infrastructure in planning, financing, building and operating for a goal-oriented sustainable regional development. The knowledge network consists of national Public Private Partnership associations and over 200 PPP Units worldwide.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Communication, Competition, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Enlargement, Environment, International co-operation and development, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Single market, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives: TEN, JESSICA, EPEC, JASPERS, JEREMIES, IPA, Act4PPP, Smart Cities and Communities
